body: Several maps in the rotations have been removed like Village, all of Tetris, The Vale, etc.  Can someone please explain??
body_tagged: Several maps in the rotations have been removed like Village, all of Tetris, The Vale, etc.  Can someone please explain??
title: What happened to walls rotations...

replies.body:
They're still in rotations:
Walls01 - The Village (7), Tetris Swamp (8)
Walls02 - Tetris Jungle (2), The Vale (6)
Walls03 - Tetris Swamp (1), The Village (5), Tetris Winter (7)
Walls04 - Tetris Winter (1), The Vale (2), Tetris Jungle (7)

I'm not sure what made you think that they were removed.
replies.body_tagged:
They're still in rotations:
Walls01 - The Village (7), Tetris Swamp (8)
Walls02 - Tetris Jungle (2), The Vale (6)
Walls03 - Tetris Swamp (1), The Village (5), Tetris Winter (7)
Walls04 - Tetris Winter (1), The Vale (2), Tetris Jungle (7)

I'm not sure what made you think that they were removed.

replies.body:
They weren't removed, but they did not appear in rotations because someone *COUGH* forgot to remove the spaces in the rotations :P

Fixed this a couple minutes ago
